issues.title: File list of this repo won't load
issues.body:
So I'm seeing this repo now, I guess I'd post this issue. The file list of this repo causes Websocket to be interrupted, and it won't load. ZeroNet complains about a missing file, but nothing more beyond that:

fileGet error: [Errno 2] No such file or directory: u'data/18r929Hq8hE5Pi9Zf7ovMQVyn3WcGfxMgu/repo.git/packed-refs

issue_comments.body: So issues work, but apparently .comment-content needs either a Markdown parser or white-space: pre-wrap.
